title: Incidents of conflict and one-sided violence since 1989
subtitle: The data refer to direct violent deaths. Deaths due to disease or famine caused by conflict are excluded. Extra-judicial killings in custody are also excluded. Only incidents involving more than 25 deaths are included. One-sided violence is that between a named organization and civilians, such as genocides. The spike in 1994 reflects the high death toll of the Rwandan genocide.
